author: MilanoBicocca-pix
body:
Update the PVFitter.errorScale parameter used in the high purity beamspot computation.
Previous value (0.9) was inherited from legacy beamspot workflow.
New value has been measured on 2018 data.
More info in the slides at https://indico.cern.ch/event/727168/contributions/3014708/subcontributions/256002/attachments/1657135/2653254/expressAlignment_validation_reprise.pdf
title: Update errorScale parameter for HP beamspot
